content: 101 chain 3 double_crochet in first 17 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 20 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 23 times turn 81 chain 3 double_crochet in first st double_crochet in next 16 sts 2 double_crochet in next 526 st 22 times turn 398 103 chain 3 double_crochet in next st and each st across turn 83 chain 3 double_crochet in next st and each st across turn 398 526 85 chain 3 double_crochet in first 18 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 17 sts 7 times skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 153 finishing 87 chain 3 double_crochet in first 9 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next end with a ws row single_crochet in each double_crochet and fasten_off 17 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 22 times turn 430 gently block shawl and weave in ends 89 chain 3 double_crochet in first 19 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 18 sts 6 times skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 141 91 chain 3 double_crochet in first 18 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 18 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 22 times turn 461 93 chain 3 double_crochet in next st and each st across turn 461 95 chain 3 double_crochet in first 20 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 19 sts 7 times skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 169 97 chain 3 double_crochet in first 8 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 19 sts 2 double_crochet in next st 23 times turn 494 © 2016 by jenn wolfe kaiser pattern is for personal use only page 3 of 3 rev 11/16 lifeadorned com
